textlib
Class Document

java.lang.Object
  textlib.Document

public class Document
extends java.lang.Object

Class that represents a text document Keeps track of the number of times a word appears in the document, it's term frequency, and eventually, its inverse document frequency (if used with TfIdf) for finding important keywords in the document

Author:
Barkin Aygun

Field Summary
 java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double[]> words

Method Summary
 java.lang.String[] bestWordList()
          Override for bestWordList with default number of words of 10
 java.lang.String[] bestWordList(int numWords)
          Gives the most important numWords words
 void calculateTfIdf(TfIdf parent)
          Calculates the tfidf of the words after called by the parent TfIdf class
 void printData()
          Prints every word in the document with their information: number of times word appears Word's term frequency (number of times it appears / total word count) Word's inverse document frequency (specifically how important it is in this document)

Document

public Document(java.io.BufferedReader br,
                TfIdf parent)
Constructor for document class that is used by the parent TfIdf class

Parameters:
br - Reader that loaded the text file already, used to read lines from large documents

Method Detail

calculateTfIdf

public void calculateTfIdf(TfIdf parent)
Calculates the tfidf of the words after called by the parent TfIdf class

Parameters:
parent - the TfIdf class

printData

public void printData()
Prints every word in the document with their information:
  • number of times word appears
  • Word's term frequency (number of times it appears / total word count)
  • Word's inverse document frequency (specifically how important it is in this document)

bestWordList

public java.lang.String[] bestWordList(int numWords)
Gives the most important numWords words

Parameters:
numWords - Number of words to return
Returns:
String array of words

bestWordList

public java.lang.String[] bestWordList()
Override for bestWordList with default number of words of 10

Returns:
String array of best words
